title: The Train: Some Lines Should Never Be Crossed...
occurrences: Some days ago, on the train... - Did Anjali find out about it?
Some days ago I had met her in the train.
She must have met you in the train.
regex: \b((?!\bTrain:)Train|(?!\bSome\ Lines\ Should\ Never\ Be\ Crossed\.\.\.:)Some\ Lines\ Should\ Never\ Be\ Crossed\.\.\.)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
